channel.title: How i get jdk 6 update 10 to work
channel.description:
ok so i made my server i got all that good junk no ip i have even played it but its all the same crud that the orginal had and i have downloaded jdk 6 update 10 beta but i am at a loss as to why i cant open a .cfg file or any of that crud so how i do it i run windows vista home premium i dont know if that changes any thing but last time i tried to change the enviroment variables i broke my java and couldent get any java things to run even reinstaling it didnt work i had to reinstal my vista and have my drives reinstaled so make sure its vista firenly cause i think thats why i had issue last time but main issue is i cant open .cfg files and cant figure how to configure java to work for me if u need to put a direct link to the download that would be very good for me
thanks in advanced fire head262/ralan

item.title: How i get jdk 6 update 10 to work
item.dc:creator: @firehead262 firehead262
item.description:
@firehead262 wrote:

well o changed to jdk 6_7 but i cant open to notepad right click only option is open
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2008, 03:20:02 pm[/size][hr]is thier some thing i should do cause i not able to edit i am right clicking it has no openn with or open as notepad and its realy buging me how hard it it is to get to freaking editing part i got every other bloody thing but editing gah :mad:

Read full topic

jdk 6 update 10 is just a beta from java you dont need it for servers opening a cfg file is winrar if you have that then rightclick and press open with notepad some will work some wont
